status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6n1ch","text":"Collect 20/40 million cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"gn9l","text":"Harvest cells by filtration onto 1.2 µm pore size filter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dfdb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dj6qi","text":"Cut the filter into two halves and store each half in separate 2 mL eppendorf tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cpe26","text":" Add 1 mL of TRIzol® Reagent (for 5-10 × 10^6 cells) to eppendorf with half filter and vortex briefly. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cnk7","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6f245","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"id":3341,"mol_weight":0,"name":"TRIzol Reagent","linfor":"","url":"https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/15596026","sku":"15596026 ","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"697A148061A111EC8A74839AE866A45F","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":95,"name":"Thermo Fisher Scientific","link":"https://www.thermofisher.com/us/en/home.html","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8veo1","text":"Flash freeze the eppendorf immediately in liquid nitrogen. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5a7bk","text":"The eppendorf can be stored at -80 °C for later extraction. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"65ul3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c5g7p","text":"Note: Do not wash cells before addition of TRIzol® Reagent.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5br7n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b8pce","text":"Defrost the samples at room temperature (use thermoshaker for 15 sec at 60 °C if defrosting takes longer). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"64bup","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"o25r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"uf7m","text":"DO NOT PROCESS MORE THAN 6 SAMPLES AT SAME TIME.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":48}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8jpvo","text":"Add 0,2g glass beads and put on thermoshaker at 60 °C for 10 min with maximum rpm (1400).  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":89,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"44s93","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":2895,"mol_weight":0,"name":"Glass beads, acid-washed, 425-600 μm (30-40 U.S. sieve) ","linfor":"","url":"http://www.sigmaaldrich.com/catalog/product/sigma/g8772?lang=en\u0026region=US","sku":"G8772-100G","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"679ED19061B111ECB4B4B742F5E7B138","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":17,"name":"Sigma Aldrich","link":"http://sigmaaldrich.com","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1cpeh","text":" Centrifuge briefly for one minute to get rid of beads and filter and move the supernatant into 2 mL eppendorf tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8bnbc","text":"Add 200 ul of CHLOROFORM per 1 ml of Trizol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"du32g","text":"Centrifuge the eppendorf for 15 minutes at 10600 rpm (12,000 g) AT MAXIMUM , at 4 °C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":64,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ncdr","text":"Transfer 500 ul (half the volume of Trizol used originally) of uppermost aqueous layer (contains RNA) into new 2mL eppendorf. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1bihr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"btkii","text":"Do not disturb middle colorless phase and lowermost pink phase while pipetting (these phases contain proteins and DNA).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":119}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2spii","text":"Add equal volume of ISOPROPANOL (500 ul) and invert the tube to mix. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8cgj3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"el8jn","text":"Don’t shake. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9a1fh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3qpv5","text":"Incubate at room temperature for 10 minutes ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f3ldg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bep7k","text":"(samples can be stored at 4 °C overnight).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c9nv6","text":"Centrifuge for 10 minutes at 10600 rpm at 4 °C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"diq5f","text":"Remove supernatant leaving RNA pellet undisturbed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c25bl","text":" Add 1 mL of 75% ethanol. Invert the tube gently to wash the pellet ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"94t8a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"g3a4","text":"(samples can be stored at -20 °C for long time).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f9rms","text":" Centrifuge for 10 minutes at 8500 rpm (7500 g) at 4 °C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bsvj6","text":"Remove supernatant leaving RNA pellet undisturbed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6besk","text":"Allow the pellet to dry for 20-30 minutes to remove all the traces of ethanol. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bnah5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5mgsb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2d6t3","text":"Care should be taken not to over dry the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":48}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4k827","text":" Re-suspend the pellet in 20-30 ul of RNA-se free water and dissolve the pellet by pipetting up and down.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c19qs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e7rk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cam92","text":"For better re-suspending, incubate the samples for 5-10 minutes at 55-60 °C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":76}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fj86b","text":"Shake the eppendorf vigorously for 15 seconds","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dpa4r","text":"Incubate for 15 minutes at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: RNA extraction from diatom P. multistriata

versions.title: RNA extraction from diatom P. multistriata
